did.unittitle: Kheel Center Triangle Fire Centennial Commemoration Collection Remember the Triangle Fire Coalition Memorabilia, 2011
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Contains memorabilia created to commemorate the 100th Anniv. of the Triangle Shirtwaist Co. Fire.
